WEAPON_001.name: Katana
WEAPON_001.description: A sharp, reliable blade for close-quarters combat. Does not consume energy.
WEAPON_001.flavor: An elegant weapon for a more civilized age. A very, very close-range age.

FIRE_001.name: Fireball
FIRE_001.description: Launch a sphere of raw flame that explodes on impact, leaving a burning area.
FIRE_001.flavor: Simple, effective, and very, very hot.

FIRE_002.name: Fireflies
FIRE_002.description: Release a swarm of homing cinders that seek out a locked-on target.
FIRE_002.flavor: Why aim when they can do it for you?

EARTH_001.name: Stone Plating
EARTH_001.description: Hit hard and absorb damage at the cost of slower movement
EARTH_001.flavor: Patience is a virtue. So is being made of rock.

WATER_001.name: Wave Power
WATER_001.description: When used on the ground, release a forceful wave in front of you that knocks enemies back.
